title: Reconnect screen right after champ select
body: Sooo I went into a bots game to warm up my computer, but right after champ select when it should've showed everyone connecting, it went right to the reconnect screen and the button didnt work, my wifi was working fine so idk what it is. HALP plz{{summoner:6}}

replies.body:
Sorry for the confusion, but this isn't exactly a bug. This can happen when you hit the loading screen if your network isn't stable enough to bridge the new connection to the game servers once champion select ends. 

First things first, double check your network settings with the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so that you can get a solid connection with Riots servers. Just because you can access youtube/google doesn't mean your network can reach Riots'. Make sure you troubleshoot in custom/practice games when this happens to avoid any possible leaverbuster penalties, and definitely let me know if this doesn't help so we can dig a little further.
